sentences.sentence: If the "fuzz" on some pterodactyls is indeed confirmed to be feathers, the origin of feathers can be traced back to more ancient times.
sentences.translation: 如果某些翼手龙身上的“绒毛”被证实的确为羽毛的话，那羽毛的起源就可以上溯到更为远古的年代。

sentences.sentence: Even pterodactyls had filaments of sorts.
sentences.translation: 甚至连翼手龙(pterodactyls)也长有结构简单的纤维。

sentences.sentence: These simple structures go way back; even pterodactyls had filaments of sorts.
sentences.translation: 这些简单的结构可以往上追溯；甚至连翼手龙（pterodactyls）也长有结构简单的纤维。
